project.name: |-- 003-local-inner-classes
project.description:
Keywords: + Local Inner Classes
This project includes a couple of very simple examples involving local inner classes:
LocalClassTest1: Demonstrates how you can define a local inner class in a method definition. Besides, the class uses an outer class field.
LocalClassTest2: Demonstrates how a local inner class can access local variables defined in the block in which the class it is defined if those are defined as final.
The classes include simple runners that can be executed as java programs.
